title: Natur
description: Fine dining with a down-to-earth attitude.
cleaned_text: Vintage interior GBG Deco Sustainable food Fine dining with a down-to-earth attitude. Natur is the restaurant for all occasions; a romantic three course meal with your loved one and carefully selected wines to match, or a place to wind down your day with a fine glass of natural Champagne. At Natur, they serve well cooked and simple yet luxurious dishes to a very affordable price. Vegetables are in constant focus.
